attributes.action: Lower the fuel costs to below £1 a litre in The Scottish HIghlands and Islands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people in the Scottish Highlands and Islands who need a vehicle to live a day to day life ie with work,schools etc are suffering fuel prices ranging from 118p-122p for unleaded and 130p-140p for diesel.Please help us

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
